nodes.text: Vulatan was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the centuries of peace known to historians as the Republic Classic era.

A Force-sensitive trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, Vulatan achieved the rank of Jedi Master circa 400 BBY. Vulatan studied as a Consular, specializing in the field of diplomacy and becoming a well-respected diplomat. On a mission assigned by the Jedi High Council, Master Vulatan was part of a relief effort to Dathomir that included fellow Masters Gra'aton and Yoda, as well as some fourteen Padawans. Attempting to salvage the wreck of the lost praxeum ship, the Chu'unthor, the Jedi were met with the Witches of Dathomir, who guard the wreck from the Jedi. After losing fourteen Padawans to the Witches, Yoda was able to negotiate the release of the surviving passengers of the ship and received the guarantee of the Witches to protect the ship's treasures from the violent Nightsisters, a dark side worshiping local cult.
